topics.body:
"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55783e6063687270d9000ec2#post_55783e6063687270d9000ec2
They're too huge for their own good, which is not a problem for people like me who voluntarily play Dwarf Fortress.

My problem with these games is the word "multiplayer." For me gaming is a solitary experience that is only ruined by the addition of other people.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557840136368727fcc0034ef#post_557840136368727fcc0034ef
I'm also not too huge on the "Click and enemy then click a thing then pray that you kill it" gameplay.

But yeah, i could probably sit down and try to learn a larger game but for single player only. For example, i still know almost every aspect of Minecraft, even though i rarely play it. I'm not too big a fan of multiplayer stuff, other a couple of things that i think should only be multiplayer. (Counter Strike)
topics.author: 5307a92d6368722c6c0d0100

topics.body:
Random Notion: 
Imagine a small flying robot that follows behind you all the time with a built-in camera. Then you have a pair of glasses that makes you see what the robot is viewing. Basically making you see yourself in third person.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
Ok its official my step Dad is the dumbest man I have ever seen.

I'm just learning now that My step Dad has fallen for those stupid click bait Side ads.

You know those annoying Ads you see on the side of your screen on sites, just to have ads there.

You know like the "YOU JUST WON A TRIP TO A 1,000,000 DOLLAR SWEEPSTAKES"

*He fucking clicked on those*

*He thought he actually won something*

And now I'm hearing that he's been getting strange phone calls from people, Plus Recently someone might have stolen some of his money!

OH MY GOD
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
